tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_locations (
    satellite_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    latitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    longitude FLOAT NOT NULL,
    altitude FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE satellites (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
orbit_radius INT,
launch_date DATE,
status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Active');

CREATE TABLE satellite_history (history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
satellite_id INT,
location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
timestamp TIMESTAMP,
FOREIGN KEY (satellite_id) REFERENCES satellites(id));

CREATE TABLE SatelliteLocations (
  location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INTEGER REFERENCES Satellites(satellite_id),
  longitude DECIMAL,
  latitude DECIMAL,
  altitude_km DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE orbital_paths (
  path_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  satellite_id INT,
  path_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);
CREATE TABLE satellites(id INT PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, category TEXT, launch_date DATE, orbit_type TEXT)
